meanings.sent1: The estimators arrived early to assess the damage.
meanings.sent2: The estimators provided their best guess for the project cost.
meanings.sent3: The estimators joked about who could guess the closest.
meanings.sent4: She was like an estimator of emotions, always able to gauge how others felt.
meanings.sent5: The estimators were like detectives, piecing together clues to reach a conclusion.

meanings.definition: A statistical method used to estimate a parameter.
meanings.sent1: The estimators in the study helped predict future trends.
meanings.sent2: Using estimators, researchers calculated the average height of the population.
meanings.sent3: The estimators at work made numbers seem like magic tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was an estimator, guiding her decisions based on limited information.
meanings.sent5: The estimators in statistics class made complex concepts easier to understand.
